data.name: Polygon's Royale : Season 1
data.detailed_description:
Polygon's Royal is the battleground survival game for everyone! It is a single player last man standing third/first person shooter in a great low poly style.

The game principle is simple, you wake up on a lonely island without any equipment and weapons. The goal is to survive among other player and be the last man standing. You play in an hostile Environment where you find weapons and other equipment. You get rewards for winning the round by being the last man standing. Your rewards can be used to upgrade your default load out and fill up your custom equipment hot drop. You can also use your hard earned cash to buy customization items for your character to give him a unique apperance. As you progress in the game you Level up ranks and unlock new items and upgrade your character to the ultimate survival machine.

The fast paced gun play is the major characteristic of the game in combination with small maps and a lot of bots a great stress reliever! so Buckle up and get some ammo! There is plenty of Action out of the box and you can adjust the bot amount to your own skill. Climb up the battle pass and rank system and unlock new items and customize your character your way and achieve greatness! Get funny masks, outfits or accessories to make your character look outstanding!

And it is still a work in progress which means things will be going under some changes up to season 2 but also an opportunity for you to shape the game to your favor!

Features:
- Singleplayer only, no multiplayer at the moment
- Level up ranks and unlock new items through the battle pass !
- Action packed third and first person shooter
- Battle Royale Mode
- Zombie Royale Mode
- Amount of bots adjustable ( AI is still in development)
- Different Statistics (hit tracking and other stats)
- different weapons and cosmetics.... more weapons are coming soon
- small Battleroyale island (small islandl will be replaced soon) more maps are coming soon
- NO MICRO TRANSACTIONS

The game is actively maintained and more content is coming soon!

More content is coming in season 2 :
- Improved AI
- Zombie escape mode
- big island
- more weapons
- Vehicles
- More items and skins

data.short_description: Polygon's Royal is the battleground survival game for everyone! It is a single player last man standing third/first person shooter for low spec pc’s with adjustable graphic settings for higher spec pc’s.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: intel iris 640
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: none
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: dedicated graphiccard
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: none

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: intel iris 640
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: keine
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore and or General Mature Content.
